## Description {#details}

This file implements the machine register scavenger.

It can provide information, such as unused registers, at any point in a machine basic block. It also provides a mechanism to make registers available by evicting them to spill slots.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### findSurvivorBackwards() {#a989e26280ba069ba20dd83144c3bd31a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static std::pair&lt; MCPhysReg, MachineBasicBlock::iterator &gt; findSurvivorBackwards (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> To, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregunits">LiveRegUnits</a> &amp; LiveOut, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> &gt; AllocationOrder, bool RestoreAfter)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given the bitvector <code>Available</code> of free register units at position <code>From</code>.

Search backwards to find a register that is part of <code>Candidates</code> and not used/clobbered until the point <code>To</code>. If there is multiple candidates continue searching and pick the one that is not used/ clobbered for the longest time. Returns the register and the earliest position we know it to be free or the position MBB.end() if no register is available.

Definition at line <a href="#l00127">127</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerscavenging-cpp">RegisterScavenging.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### scavengeFrameVirtualRegsInBlock() {#a9029683bf2a81e8247c168501e85a8b4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool scavengeFrameVirtualRegsInBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &amp; RS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Allocate (scavenge) vregs inside a single basic block.

Returns true if the target spill callback created new vregs and a 2nd pass is necessary.

Definition at line <a href="#l00391">391</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerscavenging-cpp">RegisterScavenging.cpp</a>.

### scavengeVReg() {#a176bfede6f24b05b428c0f42f9d95390}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Register scavengeVReg (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp; MRI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &amp; RS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> VReg, bool ReserveAfter)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Allocate a register for the virtual register <code>VReg</code>.

The last use of <code>VReg</code> is around the current position of the register scavenger <code>RS</code>. <code>ReserveAfter</code> controls whether the scavenged register needs to be reserved after the current instruction, otherwise it will only be reserved before the current instruction.

Definition at line <a href="#l00338">338</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/registerscavenging-cpp">RegisterScavenging.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find an available scavenging slot with size and alignment matching</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a> = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#a8320a54de0a273478de910ac3795058b">getObjectAlign</a>(FI);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid wasting slots with large size and/or large alignment. Pick one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that is the best fit for this register class (in street metric).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Picking a larger slot than necessary could happen if a slot for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// larger register is reserved before a slot for a smaller one. When</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// trying to spill a smaller register, the large slot would be found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first, thus making it impossible to spill the larger register later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = (S - NeedSize) + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.value() - NeedAlign.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align/#a80735739b49cf97a491922c8f9af2cc1">value</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> &lt; Diff) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/siencodingfamily/#ac0e8470f1a7e777b89ff85c06a5d46e0a53036b329d60f608f01b3fa1b8f0a473">SI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Diff = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SI == Scavenged.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to scavenge a register but have no spill slot, the target</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must know how to do it (if not, we&#39;ll assert below).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Scavenged.push&#95;back(ScavengedInfo(FIE));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid infinite regress</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Scavenged&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/siencodingfamily/#ac0e8470f1a7e777b89ff85c06a5d46e0a53036b329d60f608f01b3fa1b8f0a473">SI</a>&#93;.Reg = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the target knows how to save/restore the register, let it do so;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// otherwise, use the emergency stack spill slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TRI-&gt;saveScavengerRegister(&#42;MBB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/standardinstrumentations-cpp/#a6f1bbcae7288f05872dcfe811d0388baa9060587edeb01a63e3d3edc959678d1e">Before</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a6cf2f8996b1e9aaf2d7a435aaa62382f">UseMI</a>, &amp;RC, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Spill the scavenged register before \\p Before.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FI = Scavenged&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/siencodingfamily/#ac0e8470f1a7e777b89ff85c06a5d46e0a53036b329d60f608f01b3fa1b8f0a473">SI</a>&#93;.FrameIndex;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FI &lt; FIB || FI &gt;= FIE) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7f2a3d4dcfee70225988aec53ff1e173">report&#95;fatal&#95;error</a>(Twine(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Error while trying to spill &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) +</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Allocate a register for the virtual register \\p VReg. The last use of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338" lineLink="#a176bfede6f24b05b428c0f42f9d95390"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> <a href="#a176bfede6f24b05b428c0f42f9d95390">scavengeVReg</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &amp;RS,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getTargetRegisterInfo();</span></CodeLine>
